Greetings,

I am trying to set up an ANT script that sends JUnit test results in 
an e-mail.

The script is successful in sending the emails in HTML format with 
the overview-summary.html as the body of the email. Following is the 
relevant snippet of the ANT script:

  <mimemail messageMimeType="text/html"
            messageFile="${junit.results}/overview-summary.html"
	    tolist="amitk@..."
	    mailhost="10.0.1.2"
	    subject="JUnit Test Results: ${TODAY}"
	    from="amit.kushwaha@...">
	    <fileset dir="${junit.results}">
		<include name="TESTS-*.xml"/>
	    </fileset>
  </mimemail>

( Sorry please ignore mimemail - I need to change it to mail - But 
not tested as yet. )

All is well, but the only problem is that the contents of the HTML 
are not properly formatted. I guess, the problem is because of 
stylesheet.css which contains all the formatting information. Does 
any one have any idea about getting the formatting correct ? Perhaps 
by including the stylesheet somewhere in the mail or merging it 
through the script above ?

Thanks for the help.

Regards,

Amit Kushwaha
